128112965261715625.Text: A large black raven has been seen at the Altar of Thrond. Some believe the bird is a sign that witches have come to Solstheim. It may be worth investigating.

31125158552500422928.Text: The raven turned out to be one of the Glenmoril Witches. She offered me a cure for lycanthropy, but I turned her down.

53312936108712758.Text: The raven is actually a witch of Glenmoril Wyrd in animal form. She offered to cure my lycanthropy, and I accepted. I'm off to meet her sisters, and begin the "Rite of the Wolf Giver," whatever that may be....

5111164642869717568.Text: The witch Ettiene told me to talk to her sisters and complete whatever errands they may give. After I have done so, I am to talk to Ettiene again.

16845270772837422414.Text: I must retrieve the petals of a wolsfbane flower and return them to the witch named Fallaise. Wolfsbane only grows in one place on Solstheim -- at the top of Hvitkald Peak, at the southern end of the Moesring Mountains.

26650313412533132168.Text: For the witch named Isobel I must collect one bunch of ripened belladonna berries.  Ripened belladonna berries grow only near burial barrows and crypts, and are sometimes carried by Spriggans.  Unripened berries won't do.

726815477153989271.Text: I delivered the wolsfbane petals and ripened belladonna berries to the Glenmoril Witches.  I must now speak with Ettiene.

474612695954728279.Text: I spoke once more with the witch Ettiene.  The witches will use the ingredients I gathered in their lycanthropy cure, but the most difficult steps still lie ahead.  I am to meet Etienne at the Altar of Thrond to complete the Rite of the Wolf Giver.

27736213131340021915.Text: I met Ettiene at the Altar of Thrond. She has "acquired" an innocent to serve as a human sacrifice.  If I wish to never again become a werewolf, I must kill the innocent, take the heart from its body, and give it to Ettiene.

100737667221632578.Text: Ettiene bathed the innocent's heart in the potion she and her sisters had brewed, and uttered a strange incantation. I must place this Heart of the Wolf back in the body of the innocent, and then talk to Ettiene again.  I am almost cured of my lycanthropy....

20209979228189323.Text: I placed the Heart of the Wolf in the body of the innocent.  I must now talk to Etienne.

7404276241971531241.Text: Ettiene muttered her final incantation. The innocent lives once more, and has been infected with my lycanthropy!  I must kill this werewolf in order to rid myself of the curse once and for all.

1858625338197488497.Text: The werewolf innocent is dead, and my lycanthropy has been cured.  I will never become a werewolf again, and am now immune from the disease.
